name: Gunship!
description: Fly low and strike deep in the re-invention of the Gunship flight combat franchise. In Gunship! Players take control one of the worlds deadliest weapons in a simulator that is unmatched.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Pentium MMX 233 MHz or higher Memory: 32 MB RAM Graphics: SVGA video card with 2 MB video memory DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Sound card

reviews.review_text: Ahh, Gunship!, so many childhood memories are locked in this game. So many failed attempts to fly and subsequently crash into the ground too... Man I wish I still had my old Joystick so I could experience being 6 again...  The controls are not explained at all, but after about 10 minutes of pressing buttons everything came back to me. And as far as graphics go, I must say this game has aged well, it's not up to par with modern games at all but damn it still looks cool.  Also, as a side note I still have the disc for this game, it doesn't work with newer systems but hey! Still have it! Now I just need Comanche 4 again and I can die a happy man.  Probably not worth it if you're only interested in the latest and greatest, but a definite must-play if you like this kind of game. Also a definite must-re-buy if you played it in the past. GIVE IN TO YOUR NOSTALGIA, YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO.
Launched once after downloading. Since then, crashes everytime.
